Alors que Chuck espérait que le vieux bouton en laiton était une preuve évidente de la présence rassurante de son père, à 211 km plus au nord, les Norvégiens continuaient leur enquête.

I'm his button-button. While Chuck hoped the brass button was significant evidence of her father's comforting presence  131 miles due north  the Norwegians continued their investigation all the while keeping a watchful eye on Emerson Cod  who they believed knew more than he was willing to say.
